articles.author: Andrew Webster
articles.title: Star Wars spinoff Andor has a new trailer and a new premiere date - The Verge
articles.description: Disney has released a new trailer for Star Wars spinoff Andor, which will star Diego Luna and premiere on Disney Plus on September 21st.
articles.content: The Disney Plus series will now start streaming in September

articles.author: Tamara Hardingham-Gill, CNN
articles.title: Passenger fined $1,874 after two undeclared McMuffins found in luggage - CNN
articles.description: A traveler entering Australia from Indonesia has received a fine of $1,874 after two egg and sausage McMuffins bought from a McDonald's in Bali and a ham croissant were found in their luggage in violation of strict biosecurity laws.
articles.content: (CNN) A passenger traveling from Bali, Indonesia to Australia has found themselves paying a hefty price for a McDonald's breakfast.The unnamed traveler was handed a fine of 2, 664 Australian dollars… [+3393 chars]

articles.author: Jim Bowden
articles.title: MLB trade deadline eve primer: Top storylines, rumblings, best-available players - The Athletic
articles.description: Before the expected flurry of activity leading up to Tuesday's trade deadline at 6 p.m. ET, here's a primer with what you need to know.
articles.content: Happy MLB trade deadline eve! Only a few major deals have happened, but that’s about to change. As is always the case this time of year, general managers are busy, working the phones and angling for … [+15101 chars]
